Material used.Description: Expression of mutant alpha-synuclein (A53T) was analyzed in HEK293 cells.

Readout description.Result Description: Increased aggregation of alpha-synuclein (A53T) compared to wild-type.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type alpha-synuclein was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression within 10% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression exceeding 20% of wild-type levels.
